BC Originals

Crash

Crash might be unfamiliar to some, but the game is relatively easy to learn. It involves a line graph showing a purple line moving up, which multiplies your bet. You need to cash out just in time or face the consequences of your bet crashing.

You can also set a certain amount for your auto cash out, which can help you keep playing without having to track the game. Set the amount on the bottom left and auto cash out option. Maximise the time that the value is going up and when you feel that the value is enough for you, cash out immediately.

Baccarat

Baccarat has recognisable gameplay of predicting which hand is the closest value to nine without exceeding it. That is true for the BC Original game, which gives a fantastic experience on the platform.

This game variant is a simple representation of baccarat, and it's as appealing to any kind of player, whether they're new or a veteran gambler. All the bets appear at the bottom of the gameplay screen.

Classic Dice

Roll the dice here at BC Game and win the rewards! You must input the amount you want to bet and click roll. If you get your bet right, you will be rewarded. With Classic Dice, people have access to a simple yet exciting title.

The payout possibilities can be seen in the lower part of the screen with valuable stats that you can use for your wager. Its minimalistic design makes this original game easy to learn with functional and practical buttons.

Tower Legend

You have to be careful of some obstacles as you progress through the tower, but for the most part, you can have tons of fun by picking which way to go up the tower out of four options. If you get it correct, you will win fantastic rewards.

Mines

Dodge explosions with BC Game's Mines! You should be light on your feet in this game because you might miss out on some huge multipliers. Inspired by the classic game, Minesweeper, BC Game's Mines is a thrilling experience where you have to make the correct choices to come away as the winner with huge crypto rewards. You just have to avoid the mines so you won't have issues and get the win.

Ring of Fortune

Looking for a fun roulette-style wheel game? Ring of Fortune is for you! The game's central concept is to bet on which colour the wheel will stop on when spun. The game has a simple design that you can easily understand when you open it, and the gameplay is quite simple since you have to input your wager and then decide which result you would like to bet on. Once you win, it will be a satisfying result since your bet can turn into a phenomenal reward.

CoinFlip

Expect BC GAME originals to be straightforward games specially made for bettors who want to make speedy wagers. ConFlip is a fun game because it only has two outcomes but is a classic experience for everyone. It is a high-stakes game despite its simplicity. All you have to do is input your bet and then select which result you can get. The only choices are heads or tails, which offer a 50-50 chance of winning.

Soccer

Soccer is always a top selection for gambling sports betting. It can differ from league to league or country to country, but it has endured as the world’s most popular sport due to its exciting nature. Since the sport has many incredible factors, like the fun offence and the rock-solid defences, there are also multiple markets you can bet on in soccer.

It is the world’s most popular sport, with some of the biggest stars in the world. The likes of Cristiano Ronaldo, Lionel Messi, and Neymar Jr. are household names worldwide. This kind of prominence makes soccer fun to watch and bet on because it is always a spectacle.

Tennis

As the most prolific sport for solo players, tennis is fun to watch. With star players like Rafael Nadal and Novak Djokovic playing their hearts out in almost every tournament, you can expect that these super-athletes can put on a show of endurance and power with their hits.

In terms of excitement, tennis only has a few rivals because the fast-paced gameplay and the elite athleticism on display are such a fun experience. Tennis is the best choice if you want a sport to enjoy watching and betting on.

Tennis comes in a variety of formats, as you can see below:

  • Mens Doubles

Baseball

Baseball is a top-tier sport in countries like the United States or Japan, but it has become a worldwide phenomenon. You can see some powerful swings and blisteringly fast pitches in this sport. With some big names like Shohei Ohtani and Mookie Betts serving as the top dogs, baseball is fun to watch and bet on.

The central concept of baseball is to run the four bases to score whilst hitting the ball on offence. On the other hand, defence is played by pitching and catching the ball and tagging the bases or the player. If you want to find out some of the top leagues you can bet on, here are some of them:

  • Major League Baseball (US)
  • Nippon Professional Baseball (Japan)
  • Dominican Professional Baseball League (Dominican Republic)
  • Colombian Professional Baseball League (LCBP)

Cricket

There are many similarities between baseball and cricket with the concept of being a bat and ball sport. Teams bat in successive innings and attempt to score runs while the opposing team fields and is seeking to end the opponent’s inning.

Cricket is popular in various countries, including India, Pakistan, Australia, England, and many more. If you are from these countries, you would know that cricket is one of the world’s biggest sports and has an intense betting scene.

Here are some cricket competitions that you should check out:

  • Indian Premier League (India)
  • Pakistan Super League (Pakistan)
  • Big Bash League (Australia)
  • Caribbean Premier League (Caribbean countries)

BC Game Casino and Sports Payment Methods

Here are the payment methods you can use for your online casino and sports betting

Bitcoin

The crypto market’s greatest asset, Bitcoin, has been the top dog since its inception in 2009. You can buy Bitcoin on most crypto exchanges, and they are easy to use compared to most cryptocurrencies since they have been used for years. You can also see that it’s a familiar name for the platform itself.

Ethereum

Ethereum is a massive part of the crypto market with its prominence, value and impact on its entire ecosystem. It has solid value, just like Bitcoin, and with it being the second-most famous asset, ETH should be a reliable option if you want to keep playing games and betting on sports.

With Ethereum’s unique decentralised apps and the Proof of Stake move, ETH is much more different than Bitcoin because it has trumped the criticism levied against crypto involving energy consumption.

Dogecoin

Initially seen as a meme coin, Dogecoin was seen as a joke because of its imagery with the doge meme. However, it has turned into a legitimate asset because people can see that it’s more than a meme nowadays. Its reputation has skyrocketed into a legitimate currency alongside the big dogs of Bitcoin and Ethereum.

BC Game Dollar

BC Game has its digital asset called the BC Dollar. You can use it to place bets, just like any cryptocurrency available. The platform highlights using BC GAME Dollar because this is one of the best assets on the market for casino gameplay here. It is pretty stable, and you can get it on BC Game if you input funds.

Since you know the available payment methods, you might need a guide to help deposit funds into your account. Here are some steps you need to follow to make wagers on sports and play casino games:

  5. Hit the Send button.
  6. Paste the address of the wallet and the amount that you set.

Frequently asked questions

Since you are having fun with BC Game, you might also have questions that other people have asked. Here are some of the most common questions that might come across your mind.

Is BC Game Casino legit?

Yes, BC Game is a legitimate online casino. It has a licence approved by the Curaao government. It is also a verified operator for the Crypto Gambling Foundation. Lastly, responsible gaming efforts and an age restriction are applied on the site to help people know if they’re allowed to play or not.

Is BC Game Casino website safe?

Yes, BC Game is a secure site that is usually encrypted, which makes for a safer time on the platform. It also helps that cryptocurrencies are the primary mode of payment here, which means transactions are secure thanks to blockchain technology.

How do crypto casinos work?

An crypto online casino like BC GAME functions almost the same as any Bitcoin online casino you probably know about. The payment method is different since cryptocurrencies are the primary method of payment. You should also understand that the deposit and withdrawal processes will be much faster, too, since it’s based on crypto.

What casino games have the best odds?

If you want to play the games with the best odds, it is hard not to recommend BC Originals. They only have a 1% house edge, meaning they have a standard RTP of 99%. That is an astounding number for bettors, which is why BC Original games are solid options for your time here on BC GAME.

Why do casinos give free play?

Casinos give free play because that is their way to help players try out the games first. It is more important than you might think because these free play sessions can help players get accustomed to the gameplay so they won’t have issues moving forward.

What time is BC Game's customer support available?

There is no delay with BC GAME’s customer service because they work around the clock. You can contact our 24-hour customer support anytime as they are ready and willing to help you by answering any of your questions.

Can I play at BC Game Casino on VPN?

Yes, you can play on the BC Game casino using a VPN. It will be all-important for countries that restrict access to BC Game because this is their only way of playing here. Do not worry. VPNs are allowed here so that the gameplay will be smoother for some.

Which BC Game casino games pay real money?

Every time you log onto BC GAME, you can earn real money. The BC Originals like Crash, Baccarat, Ring of Fortune, CoinFlip, and many more can offer you real money rewards. It is also the same for the slots, table games, and other options on the platform. Most importantly, you can earn real money from any game if you keep using fiat currency options.

Does BC Game Casino also offer sports betting?

Yes! Crypto sports betting is one of the top offerings in BC Game. You can bet on multiple sports here, and there are reliable odds that can help you become better bettors in the long run.
